options.lowShield.tooltip: While on, lowers the shield when shield-crouching for greater visibility
options.attackIndicatorValue.tooltip: Adjust this slider to change the value at which the Attack Indicator will charge to on screen. By default this is 2.0, to match CTS.
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.title: Atlas Combat
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.bedrockBlock: Block Reach minimum value matches Bedrock Edition
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.midairKB: Allows Non-Projectile sources of damage to knock players up into the air even if they are already in the air
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.fistDamage: Fist Damage is updated to 1, matching the change made to Bedrock Edition
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.saturationHe: Healing relies on saturation as a buffer, rather than just taking hunger
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.configOnlyWe: Adds Knives and Longswords with their own respective stats and abilities.
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.axeReachBuff: Raises axe reach to 3 as a balancing change
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.autoAttackAl: Option for servers which will prevent using auto-attack on client
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.attackSpeed: If disabled and your tool is maxed attack speed, will prevent attacks from resetting. If all speed configs are maxed out, will also apply to every other item, and your fists.
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.ctsAttackBal: Determines whether or not weapons will deal less damage than they do in 1.9
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.maxWaitForPa: Ticks to wait before disconnecting from server
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.swordProtect: Modifies the strength of sword blocking by intervals of 0.125
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.baseHoeAttac: Wooden, Stone, and Gold Hoe Damage Bonus
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.ironDiaHoeAt: Iron and Diamond Hoe Damage Bonus
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.goldDiaNethH: Golden, Diamond, Netherite Hoe Speed Offset
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.slowestToolA: Slowest Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.slowToolAtta: Slow Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.fastToolAtta: Fast Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
atlas-combat.midnightconfig.fastestToolA: Fastest Auto-Corrected Modded Weapon / Tool Speed Offset
